name: Death of the Author
description:
"You’ve been a mediocre author your entire life.
The ridicule, the rejection letters… it was all supposed to change today.
But suddenly, you dropped dead on your desk.
They say the spirit haunts this earth until his work is finished.
Your magnum opus is almost complete. You have one night. One last re-write.

Make it count."

Talk to the spirits of the world's greatest authors and learn how to make your novel better. This is your legacy. Send it out and learn how the critics react.

You can listen to the OST of the game:

  • https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1030Rcdups9uyeZPnHyA6WYL2CERC0av8?usp=sharing

Made by Team Elfo:

  • Nikko
  • Raddo
  • Neddo

  • https://www.kenney.nl/assets/toon-characters-1

SGJ 2021 - Theme: Death Begets Life
